entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
